auto.description:
[Termination] Mode: Deals 360% attack power Chaos damage to designated enemy unit
[Death Silence] Mode: Moves 5 meters toward the enemy unit with the highest ATK and deals 360% attack power Chaos damage to them
auto.name: Death Silence Prelude

normal.description:
[Termination] Mode: Deals 120% attack power Chaos damage to designated enemy unit
[Death Silence] Mode: Moves in front of the enemy unit with the highest ATK and deals 120% attack power Chaos damage to them
normal.name: Nether Touch

passive.description:
[Termination] Mode: All damage penetrates 24% of the target's resistance
[Death Silence] Mode: All damage reduces the target's total damage output by 36%

[Battle Start Bonus]: If there is at least 1 other Chaos attribute character in the team besides Hela, Hela's Crit Damage increases by 60%
passive.name: Termination Echo

ultimate.description:
Enters [Termination] mode at the start of battle. Ultimate can switch between [Termination] or [Death Silence] modes. Switching modes changes all skills.

[Passive Mechanic]: When allies cast their ultimates, Hela gains layers of [Domination Authority: Chaotic Death] equal to the energy consumed (max 5 layers per cast). Upon reaching 10 layers, can consume all layers to cast [Enhanced Ultimate], then reaccumulates layers after switching modes.

[Enhanced Ultimate]:
[Termination] Mode: Deals 2160% attack power Chaos damage to a specified enemy unit
[Death Silence] Mode: Moves in front of the enemy with the highest ATK and continuously attacks them, dealing a total of 2160% attack power Chaos damage
ultimate.name: Domination Authority - Chaotic Death

teamSkill.description: ATK increases by 10%. At the start of battle, for every 500 ATK, increases own Chaos damage by 5% (max 6 stacks, up to 30% Chaos damage bonus)
teamSkill.name: Combination Skill

enhancedUltimate.description: When reaching 10 layers from ally ultimates, can consume all layers to cast Enhanced Ultimate

modeSwitching.description: Hela can switch between Termination and Death Silence modes using her Ultimate

teamSynergy.description: Chaos attribute team bonus increases Crit Damage
